Keeping state

{% raw %}

count_calls[source]

count_calls(func)

Count the number of calls to a function

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fibonacci[source]

fibonacci(number)

Calculate Fibonacci numbers fib_n The Fibonacci numbers are 1, 2, 3, 5 ,8, 12, 21, ... fib_n = fib_n-1 + fib_n-2

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fibonacci(5), fibonacci.num_calls

(8, 15)
{% endraw %}

Decorating classes

{% raw %}

class CountCalls[source]

CountCalls(func)

Count a number of calls for a function

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fibonacci[source]

fibonacci(number)

Calculate Fibonacci numbers fib_n The Fibonacci numbers are 1, 2, 3, 5 ,8, 12, 21, ... fib_n = fib_n-1 + fib_n-2

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fibonacci(1), fibonacci.num_calls

(1, 1)
{% endraw %}
